name: Save the frog!
description:
How to play

Use your mouse and left click to pick up a frog. Release the left click to drop it. You must drop the frog in the lake corresponding to its color.

Trijam

This game was made for the Trijam #150. The theme was Grouping. There was a 3 hour limit to play games but I went over and it took me a little over 3 hours to make. 

Idea

I was inspired by a mini game in a mario game where you have to sort the bombs before they explode. You must group the frogs in the body corresponding to their color

Art

I used the Tiny Bundle pack made by Vryell. All the visuals were taken in this pack. No art were made during the game jam. Go take a look at Vryell's work it's amazing!
